subject: Re: Thanx Guys and a question to the group
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Ah...the waffle.  My mind does this too, and you begin wondering if you 
are just nuts.  Then, you record a message that is mind blowing and you 
think, "This just may be working."  LOL  I understand, Steve, and am 
with you... ;)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Thanx to those who listened to my recent posts and it really brings 
> that question up again "Are we really Hearing This ??".  If everybody 
> hears something different, than who's right?  I post what i think i 
> hear and than when others hear something else, i can hear that too.  
> Why didn't i hear it the first time?  Also, until a clearer format 
> becomes available to our spirit friends we will forge ahead with what 
> we have.  It's very frustrating to say the least, i don't hear what 
> others hear and they don't hear what i do.  It's a giant circle of 
> confusion and mis-understanding.  Maybe it's just radio gibberish, 
when 
> set at a certain speed makes our mind wander...who know's...right??
> 
> -Steve H.
>
